# All files entitlement

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have access to all files.

## Deprecated entitlements

- **Maps Entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may provide directions beyond what Maps supports, such as subway routes, hiking trails, and bike paths.
- **Inter-App Audio Entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may exchange audio with other Inter-App Audio-enabled apps.
